name: Catastrophic Defence
description:
In Catastrophic Defence,  Cats must protect their holy cat by fighting off relentless waves of evil rats.

 Players will build and upgrade towers strategically placed around the map in order to keep the rats away from the holy cat. As the waves of rats get more powerful, cats must shoot enemies, place and upgrade towers to protect their holy cat.

Catastrophic defence is an intense and exciting game that will test your strategic skills.

Devs:

  • Alex Verstraten  https://u200537.gluweb.nl/portfolio/
  • Tim van der Geest https://u200697.gluweb.nl/Portfolio/

Artist:

  • Yasmin de Jonge  https://www.artstation.com/yasmindejonge8
  • Nigel Roelandschap https://www.artstation.com/joyfuldemon01
  • Aafke van Roon https://www.artstation.com/aafkevanroon
